title: New Zealand vs England LIVE Updates, 3rd Test Day 2
description: New Zealand vs England LIVE Scorecard Updates, 3rd Test Day 2: Kiwi pace talisman Tim Southee is playing the final Test match of his career.
excerpt: New Zealand vs England LIVE Scorecard Updates, 3rd Test Day 2: Kiwi pace talisman Tim Southee is playing the final Test match of his career.
text: NZ v ENG LIVE Updates, 3rd Test Day 2© X (Twitter) New Zealand v England LIVE Score Updates, 3rd Test Day 2: New Zealand will be aiming to finish strong, with Mitchell Santner still at the crease as play resumes against England in third Test on Day 2. Santner struck a quickfire half-century late on Day 1 to take New Zealand past the 300-run mark. England will be hoping to continue in their aggressive batting style, with the likes of Ben Duckett and Harry Brook expected to take charge, amidst the composure provided by the experienced Joe Root. New Zealand's 36-year-old pace talisman Tim Southee will hope to get among the wickets, in what is his last-ever Test match. (LIVE SCORECARD) Topics mentioned in this article
html:
NZ v ENG LIVE Updates, 3rd Test Day 2© X (Twitter)

New Zealand v England LIVE Score Updates, 3rd Test Day 2: New Zealand will be aiming to finish strong, with Mitchell Santner still at the crease as play resumes against England in third Test on Day 2. Santner struck a quickfire half-century late on Day 1 to take New Zealand past the 300-run mark. England will be hoping to continue in their aggressive batting style, with the likes of Ben Duckett and Harry Brook expected to take charge, amidst the composure provided by the experienced Joe Root. New Zealand's 36-year-old pace talisman Tim Southee will hope to get among the wickets, in what is his last-ever Test match. (LIVE SCORECARD)

Topics mentioned in this article
